111.title: cadpig

1112.content: Does she gain weight by herself or is she forced to gain?
1112.title: Naturally

11122.content: While on the Dalmatian farm, cadpig was up early in the morning looking around, just taking in the scenery when she heard the rustling of the autumn leaves, as she looked up noticing the birds and the squirrels getting ready for the upcoming winter. "Am I really the first one up?" she wondered to herself as she begun to make it to the barn hoping penny or two-tone was around, whispering at a low voice Cadpig asked "psst... anyone awake yet?" with nothing but a light snore coming from the barn and a moo from one of the cows she was wondering if she was really actually the only person that was up now this was defiantly a first for the little puppy, but the puppy was far from alone. As two scheming men were in a jalopy peering upon the farm with somewhat evil intentions, not even noticing the still car just pranced around happy as can be to actually have some alone time without her brothers or sisters budding in. relaxing upon a oak tree, soaking up the serenity that was upon her, mean while Horace and japer were sulking around the farm looking for the Dalmatians for their boss, miss cuella de vil. While they were searching around for the dogs jasper spotted cadpig at the big oak tree sleeping all alone, "well this isn't our lucky day is it Horace?" as Horace responded back to his cohort stating "no, it is not all we found on this lousy farm is this wee one, the misses isn't going to be please with us, not one bit", while thinking of what to do a cow mad a noise startling the two bumbling henchmen so with a quick reaction the two just grabbed cadpig and ran out of the farm and back into their car, starting to drive off. Once at the cruella manor Horace and Jasper begun to empty out the burlap sack in front of their boss revealing the runt of the littler cadpig, with a sign of anger the mistress de vil begun yelling at the two henchmen 'this is all you have for me one measly puppy I need all of them to make even one dress'stated cruella while she smacked her henchmen. While the beatings continued for their incompetence, cruella had an evil plan cooking in her mind, as she went over every inch of the puppy with her eyes like they were a fine tooth comb, a plan begun formulating in her mind as she lifted up cadpig cruella started to yell at her lackeys, 'Horace, jasper go to the pet store and but plenty of dog food' with a smile on her face Horace and jasper started looking at cruella with a puzzling face, 'uhh miss I'm not one to question but why do we need dog food?' with an angered voice their boss responded 'cause you bumbling twits, this runt isn't going be so small any more' with a chuckle from cruella the two henchmen were more puzzled than before as they left for the pet store

1211.content: How does Faline gain? does she just become lazy and gain on her own or does she get forced to become fat? or something else?
1211.title: Naturally

12112.content:
Deep in the forest, there lived a curious doe whom always loved to play with all the other woodland animals, spring had just arrived after a harsh winter that just overcome the king of the forest's kingdom. Faline was just a young fawn who didn't know much about the world around her, giggling at everything. The king of the forest begun his daily work of protection for the forest, with the queen of the forest deceased from hunters that had trespassed into the forest, nothing was to stop the king from protecting his domain, it was his only focus. Peeking at the king she had noticed a new young buck that seemed afraid of his surroundings, "this is your domain Bambi every little creature from the smallest field mouse to the largest bear are under your protection, we conduct your teachings of this land later, for now meet your people" he stated to his son, noticing the doe hiding in the bushes behind a mighty oak tree.

Bambi didn't know what to expect from the new area that was his father's domain it was all new to him, he had his two friends with him which made the transition to this new environment more bearable. Thumper and Flower have been through it all with the prince of the forest, from him dealing with his mother's passing to his father taking him to the strange new place. Faline didn't know how to approach this new playmate any other way than to be her rambunctious giggling self, she didn't have many playmates other than her twin brother since not many fawns were around her age to play with. Seeing that the young buck was alone she saw this as her chance to meet him, chasing him through the trees like a bat out of hell, swerving and crossing Faline finally made it to her target who wasn't even expecting a doe like her to be around. Bursting out of the trees and into a clearing Faline frightened Bambi half to death with her antics she started to speak in a coy manner " what's the matter scaredy cat, can't catch me even if you tried to" this got right under the skin of Bambi as no young doe was going to out race him.

The two begun to play in the large forest that they called home, it was fun for Bambi it seemed like all of his worries began to disappear, this little race seemed to be the start of a great friendship. While the two fawns played they never even heard the cracking of a branch off in the distance, the sounds of whatever broke that branch. After a while the two fawns were exhausted from their games, "what was that noise" Bambi exclaimed frightened about what it was. Closer and closer the sound came to Bambi and Faline, afraid of what these noises were caused by the two of them fled. Faster and faster they ran trying to get away, Faline got stuck upon a loose root twisted leg and caught between the entanglements of roots. Bambi fled frightened by whatever was creating those horrid sounds, not having the nerve to go back for the doe he coward away looking for his father to protect him. Meanwhile the noise got closer and closer only to reveal a bunch of...
12112.title: King of the Forest

choices: Faline is still in the forest
121121.content:
The crackle of the brush that was around the edge of the dense forest that was behind Faline, not knowing what this sound was the only thing Faline thought to do was to back up but as she noticed quite quickly, this was impossible for her hind leg was still tangled in the rich number of roots that based the bed of the forest. She didn’t know what to do as her only option of escape was exhausted thanks to her leg being completely immobile by the massive trees that surrounded the area where Bambi left her to fend for herself, “so much for the prince of the forest” she scoffed at him, trying to make light of the situation only made Faline realize that it was quite a dire situation that she was in as the sound of whatever was moving into the forest began its descent upon her position with unbiased intent. Scared of what she was going to encounter Faline futilely tried to tug at the roots that bound her to the spot where she awaited the fate that has been given to her. It seem as it humans have entered the forest of the king, three of them looked quite unassuming much less threatening than her mother has described them, Faline just looked at the humans they held a metallic looking object in each of their hands this object peaked Faline's interest she made sure to be hidden from the humans as they prowled deeper into the forest to fortunes untold.

　　There were only three humans that Faline could see all dress in the same garb which consisted orange vests covering flannel shirts and brow pants that helped them blend into the surrounding area. Curious with these humans Faline didn't even notice there was someone creeping upon her hidden position, the clicking of a gun was heard behind Faline, fearing for whom ever was behind her Faline begun to worry whom was behind her. Sharply Faline turned around just fast enough to see a glimmer of whom was behind her, seeing golden locks swaying in the wind as Faline begun studying the beautiful face of what seemed to be a woman, looking like she didn’t belong with the three other more gruff older looking men that accompanied the young woman. Faline couldn’t even flee from her hiding spot as the woman bashed the poor fawn across the skull knocking her out for a time, dragging her new found catch the edge of the woods to place upon in the back of her pick-up truck to be mounted. “You call that a catch it’s not even a one pointer” one of the men chuckled as they all left the area to return to their own lives. Driving home to a lavished mansion like property the woman whom hasn’t even looked at her catch since they left the home of Faline, changing the station of the radio she couldn’t do anything but scoff at her own inability as a hunter saying quietly to herself “good one Nadine all you can catch is fawns, looks like impressing the higher ups with my hunting abilities is something that I need to work on”, looking into her rear view mirror, backing up into the drive way of her well-earned home, nothing but trees and forest encompassed her property fences darted around so no critters would wander into her property uninvited.

　　Dragging her newly acquired kill through the garage and into the basement of the house, it was an impressive level all on its own. The garage was split into four large section, which all had memorabilia from her past achievements and adventures over the years. Closer and closer Nadine got to the area where she usually skinned and chopped her various animal kills, not even realizing that Nadine had never finished the job upon Faline and the young doe was merely knocked out from the trauma of being bashed into the skull with the stock of Nadine’s rifle. Groggily Faline begun to wake up from her unconscious state in fear and confusion of where she was. Scared and alone Faline begun to do the only thing she could think out at the time, run away from this place where she found herself in, kicking Nadine’s hands causing her to let go of the young doe’s legs allowing her to run wild. Corner to corner Faline tried to find an escape route for herself as there was no hole or opening that she could squeeze through, even with her small stature she didn’t know how to escape from this woman whom uprooted her from the place she called home. Trying as she might Nadine could see the fawn wouldn’t listen to reasons no matter how much she tried to calm her down, looking upon her prize more closely she could see this doe was quite beautiful in her own right, knowing that she wouldn’t calm down and not seeing any other way to relax the doe Nadine grabbed her trusty tranquilizer gun and took aim. Almost instantaneous the drug concoction that was in the needle that was shot into Faline’s side, out like a light the drugs took hold of Faline and unconscious came to her quickly. No longer wanting to skin this beautiful doe Nadine could only chuckle as a sinister thought popped into her head, laughing more manically she only whispered “one pointer huh? We’ll see”
121121.title: Nadine the Hunter

choices: Force the fawn to eat like a pig
Pamper the fawn until she is used to her surroundings
1211211.content:
Afraid of her surroundings as where she was, this human has taken her from the forest for some reason, knowing that humans were like wolves in a sense they were devious and cunning. Not wanting to take any chances with this woman Faline begun to look for a way out of w here ever she was, it seemed to be hopeless as the white sheen of the basement confused and disoriented the young doe’s perception of what was happening all around her, seeing this Nadine begun her plans to capture Faline, making sure to be as less threatening as humanly possible Nadine begun her descent upon the fawn. Slowly she begun to reach out her hand to the fawn trying to familiarize herself to Faline as a friend not foe. Cautious around this woman for not having any interaction with humans made it quite difficult to read, if this woman did have something sinister planned for Faline was none the wiser. Indeed Nadine had something planned for this beautiful doe, the other hunters wanted to make fun of her catch well when they get a load of her prey when she’s done with the necessary preparations the at needed to be made. Nadine couldn’t believe this animal whom she was about to kill was now Nuzzling against the woman’s side, “it must think I’m her mother or something" Nadine believed as each time she moved away from Faline she only got closer to her, sadden at the state of affairs that was now her destiny, her only friend was this one woman and she seemed to be nice enough and reminded her of her stern yet loving mother.

Not even realizing that it has been quite some time since her last meal, a growl from her stomach “my, my hungry are we?" Na dine asks charmingly to the young doe, slightly Faline blushed as she was embarrassed with her hunger, it was not quite ladylike of her. Moving her black hair out of her face and tying it in a ponytail, she had a quite athletic body, while her olive skin shined with a healthy glow to it. Faline's instincts were all out of whack when she was near this woman, she didn't know why this woman would want to bring Faline to her house, this confused her to no ends, not even knowing where she was at the moment she thought this woman seemed nice enough to trust. This was going to be a poor judgment of Nadine's character, so many plans for this doe was Running through out Nadine's mind, not knowing how to exactly to go about to fee d this beautiful fawn to make her grow massive. Petting Faline to make her feel welcome to her new surroundings, completely content with where she was feeling as if Nadine was her mother. "My, my, aren’t you an affectionate little bugger, you could almost make my heart all warm and tingly, but it’s time for dinner my little pet" grinned Nadine.

Using the intercom that connected the rest of the of her luxurious s mansion Nadine spoke into it calling her faithful servant, “Annie please prepare a meal for me and my new pet deer.” Annie was fir st taken a back of what she heard, the mistress never was one to s hare a connection with animals, and she was one whom killed animals not befriend them. “This is quite a change mistress, what shall I make for you and your new pet?” Annie asked calmly and orderly manner, thinking long and hard of what Faline would love to eat that is al so fattening for this little doe to become a big ball of flab. “my pet project would love to eat some sweets, no matter how much she dislikes it”, grinning like the Cheshire cat she was going to make her new pet the biggest fawn, ever seen.

1511.content: How will the little fox become a blob?

1512.content: The Jealous country singer is gonna gain, but how?
1512.title: Dixie

15121.content: Will Dixie gain weight on her own? Or maybe she gains due to being force fed?
15121.title: Naturally

151212.content:
Quite a bit had happened since after Tod parted with Copper alongside Vixey being his mate.

For the ultimate irony, Amos Slade had died of a heart attack weeks later, followed by Chief dying of sadness, and Copper, not wanting to be alone and realizing it was now an option to have Tod back, went into the woods when Widow Tweed learned of all that had happened and what that meant when she did for the same reason, and Tod and Vixey were now given a choice of being pets(once more in Tod's case)and Tod being friends with Copper again, and they promptly accepted, so there was a happy old lady with three just as happy pets, and an even happier Tod and Copper.

But a few days after this, down in Tennessee, country music singer dog, Dixie, a member of the Singin' Strays, had it so that literally quite a bit had happened.

You see, while Dixie was still able to perform along with the other band members who were still alive, the problem was that she had to hide how perpetually sad she was, because Zelda had recently passed away.

There were numerous dog bones like the ones she had started eating during a time she was really angry but Zelda took them away and warned her that she would get fat way back when.

Specifically, a whole giant bag of them, and Dixie was hungry when she discovered it having somehow been dropped and left behind where she was going.

"Dog bones?" she thought to herself, realizing what this meant and how it might help make her less said and more happy if she ate them all, but then said in her mind: "No...wait...it's not what Zelda would want...surely there's a better way ta lessen mah sadness...even though Ah'm hungry..."

Her stomach challenged her by growling really loudly, but she continued trying to resist the urge, saying: "NO...there's plenty of other places Ah could find food, an' Ah have far more strength of character than ta give in an' get fat thanks ta these. Zelda warned me...Ah won't let her down...Ah won't...!"

Finally, after her stomach growled thrice as loud as it had before, Dixie sighed and thought to herself: "Ah'm so sorry, Zelda. Well, Ah suppose one could see it as me punishin' mahself for all the wrong Ah did a while back for such selfish reasons. Still, Ah honestly thought Ah was stronger than this, but here we go..."

She ripped open the bag and ate up all the bones, which, to her surprise, tasted better than anything she'd ever eaten in her life, which was because they had considerably more sugar, fat and calories in them than any other kind of dog food, clearly meant, as she realized, for skeletal dogs.

"Well," she thought as she realized this just after she finished it, "Ah guess Ah really do deserve ta be punished, but Ah sure got the job done."

Her belly was an enormous sphere of flab, and said flab also thickly covered her back, her sides, her neck and all four of her limbs, with her ass half as massive as her belly.

Additionally, while she was still able to walk, she had to push herself up onto her hind feet in order to do so, and even then, she could no longer walk on four limbs and had become quite slow, looking down at her gigantic gut after managing to walk without falling over, and she shook her head sadly while unable to see her feet but very able to see her belly button, which had become taller and deeper, along with being able to tell that the reason she was able to use her tail for balance like she was currently doing was because even that had gotten thicker and fatter.

Indeed, the only part of her that looked the way it did before she found those bones was her head, and she sighed, ready for what she believed was to come when all of the still living members of the Singin' Strays, including her love, Cash, came along to see where she was and got the shock of their lives upon seeing how she had become a huge ball of fat and indeed her blubber capacity was most massive.

Dixie explained everything and then thought to herself: "Well, here it goes...they're either gonna hate me an' estrange themselves from me forever, or still be mah friends, or, in Cash's case, mah boyfriend, an' have me as part o' the Singin' Strays."

So how did it turn out?
151212.title: Corpulent Punishment

choices: She closed her eyes, hung her head and began to cry
She started crying, but then someone saw her and came over
1512121.content:
"Dixie, you weak, gluttonous abomination!" Cash barked(pun intended)at her. "Even though I would otherwise love you still despite your being so fat now, the reason for it is just so appalling that I cannot be your boyfriend anymore, nor can anyone here consider you a friend or even any kind of member of the Singin' Strays! Zelda may have died, but if she saw this and were capable of dying again in heaven, she would do so thanks to the shame she would feel about this disgraceful action of yours!"

Along with flashing her hostile glares while not speaking, since they didn't want to talk to Dixie at all and Cash's scathing words were plenty enough to speak for them all, the others kept quiet while Cash continued: "So consider yourself out of the Singin' Strays and our relationship alike! I wish it were otherwise on both counts! I really do, just like is the case with the others here! Again, if you'd simply gotten fat any other way, it would make no difference to me and you would still be my girlfriend, and I your boyfriend, and these others would still be your friends and fellow performers! But not when something like this has happened! We will not have a Zelda disgracing, strength of character lacking dog like you as one of us! Good luck living the rest of your life on your own, which is what you will now do!"

They all walked away furiously and, once they were out of sight, Dixie sighed morosely, and what did she do next?
1512121.title: They hated her

choices: She relented and stopped hurting her.
She scoffed and continued causing her pain mercilessly.
15121211.content:
Dixie's head went downwards, with her nose touching the blubber at the top of her belly, and started crying.

She now hated the fact that she existed, and wished that her incredibly obese state would make her die of a heart attack in order to stop the emotional pain she was now feeling, even though she knew that it would cause her physical pain.

"Cash...guys..." she wept through closed eyes. "Please come back. Ah don't wanna be alone..."

Suddenly, a duo of country dogs came along and one of them asked: "WHOA! What in the world?"

And the other one said: "That is one fat saluki! Standin' on her hind legs, too! And she's...CRYING?"

They went over and said: "Hi there. Who are you, and why are you so sad?"

"Ah...Ah'm D...Dixie..." the saluki managed to push through her tears as she kept her head hung. "An' Ah...Ah'm cryin' because..."

After filling them in on everything they needed to know, one of the dogs, John, took pity on Dixie and wanted to comfort her, while the other, his sister, Kate, was very angry at Dixie and wanted to add to her pain.

"Let's try and make her feel better, Kate." said John, and then Kate barked: "Better idea...let's add to that punishment of hers she spoke of!"

Then, pushing John aside, Kate ran over in front of Dixie and pushed her down, subsequently starting to torture her with bites, squeezes and pinches all around her belly and her sides, along with drilling one claw after the other into her belly button in a way that hurt a lot, along with using said claw navel attack to do further pinching.

Dixie howled in pain and begged for her to stop, while John fell over from shock and said shock made him unable to get up.

Kate did what following Dixie's begging?
15121211.title: She closed her eyes, hung her head and began to...

choices: Yes, he managed to convince them.
No, they still hated Dixie and wanted nothing to do with her.
151212111.content:
"Wait..." Kate said, realizing that Dixie was already in enough pain, given that she was wishing she didn't exist right now, so she got off of her and said: "Ah'm...Ah'm sorry, Dixie. Ah guess Ah was just taken a hold of by a desire ta make ya feel worse when ya really should be made ta feel better, all because of what part of what ya filled me in on enraged me, even though that part was somethin' that you were sorry for an' unhappy about like all the rest of it was."

"It's...it's okay, Kate..." Dixie managed to squeeze through how she was now crying even more and a big sniff that accompanied it. "But...could ya...help me up, please?"

Kate went over and tried, but Dixie was way too heavy, so she said: "John? Can ya help me here, please?"

John, who could now get up again, his shock having worn off, got to his feet and said: "No problem, Kate. Ah'm glad ya realized that ya shouldn'ta been hurtin' poor Dixie like that without mah needin' ta pull ya off. Now, let's just give one big pull here..."

With John's assistance, Kate managed to get Dixie back onto her feet like she'd been before that other country girl dog attacked her so brutally, and Kate then said: "There! You're standin' again."

"Thank you, Kate. John." Dixie said to them. But she was still crying, and Kate licked her eyes while going: "Now, now, Dixie, don't cry. Don't be sad. We can fix this problem."

John then said: "Ah'll go an' see where the Singin' Strays went an' convince 'em ta give ya another chance, Dixie!"

"Thanks, John." Dixie said as the last of her tears were gone thanks to Kate's tongue and she gave one final sniff.

While Kate looked after Dixie, John managed to find the Singin' Strays, and upon introducing himself and telling them what he and Kate had seen before with Dixie, he tried to convince them to let her rejoin them.

Was he successful?
151212111.title: She relented and stopped hurting her.

choices: Dixie wants to be with Flash.
Dixie wants to be with Cash once again.
15121212.content:
After Cash yelled at Dixie and the other dogs walked away furiously, Dixie was crying as a concerned male dog a basset hound with a red Stetson cowboy hat and a southern fried accent who was an eyewitness had come over to where Dixie was at as he immediately consoled the little lady herself.

"Hey there little lady don't cry ergo it's all right ma'am now you dry them tears of yours up and tell yours truly what happened as that lead singer shouldn't have yelled at you as your friends shouldn't have walked out on you." The concerned male dog said as she stopped crying and told him about what unfolded earlier on.

"Well *sniff* Cash called me a weak gluttonous abomination, as he said even though he would otherwise love me despite me being so fat now, the reason for it is just so appalling that he couldn't be my boyfriend anymore, nor would anyone consider me a friend even a member of the Singin' Strays, as he also mentioned Zelda may have died, but if she saw this and was capable of dying again in Heaven, she'd do so thanks to all the shame she'd feel about this disgraceful action of mine."

"And he booted me out of the Singin' Strays as he also booted me out of our relationship as he wishes it was otherwise different on both accounts." Dixie said.

"Now he should've known better than to say something like that to a pretty little lady like you, ergo I'm gonna find Cash myself as I'm gonna make him pay for what he said to you as I'll also at least give his friends a good ole fashioned tongue lashing they'll never forget!" The male dog said as he was gonna make Cash pay for what he said as he bared his pearly white sharp teeth and angrily snarled as he stormed off to find Cash and the others.

Meanwhile Cash and the others unaware of what was about to happen realized their leader should've thought about what he said to Dixie as one of the members of the Singin' Strays spoke up.

"Cash that was very mean of you to say something like that to Dixie as that's no way to ever talk to a lady especially Dixie." Waylon said as Cash looked at him.

"I wholeheartedly have to agree with my brother for after all that was uncalled for Cash, ergo if you see Dixie you owe her an apology." Floyd said as his brother nodded in agreement as he angrily looked at Cash.

"What were you thinking Cash for after all poor Dixie's heartbroken and upset because you yelled at her and insulted her as you booted her out of the group, ergo hang your head in shame Cash for after all Zelda wouldn't have let you yell at her or insult her you bad bad dog." Granny Rose said as she scolded Cash himself.

"Now look everyone I lost my temper and you're right I shouldn't have yelled at her nor should I have booted her out of the group as that's not the right way to talk to a lady especially Dixie, as I am gonna have to apologize to her and maybe even beg for her forgiveness, ergo I hope you're all happy as I'm gonna take a walk with my head hung in shame." Cash said as he walked away from the group itself as that male dog who comforted Dixie earlier on found Cash himself as the male dog angrily confronted Cash himself as the other dogs could only look on in utter shock and silence right as Dixie showed up and had looked at both Cash and the male dog who comforted her earlier on.


"I take it you're Cash himself in other words the guy who's gonna pay for what he said to Dixie as I had to comfort the little lady herself ergo what do you have to say for yourself?" The male dog angrily asked Cash.

"What I said was most uncalled for as I lost my temper and whatnot ergo step aside whoever you are for I'm going to take a walk with my head hung in shame." Cash said as he started to walk off into the distance as the male dog immediately stopped him.

"Hold it now you don't have to walk off into the distance with your head hung low for after all we'll let the little lady choose who she wants to be with as my name's Flash and I'm a basset hound in case anyone's wondering what kind of breed of dog I am by the way." Flash said as he wanted Dixie to choose who'd she wanted to be with.
15121212.title: She started crying, but then someone saw her an...

151212123.content:
Dixie stated: "Although Ah wanna be with Cash again, especially since Ah forgive him for losin' his temper an' what it resulted in, given he's clearly sorry, Ah think you, Flash, should be allowed ta join us. Yeah, y'all heard right! Flash, given what he's done for me, should be a member o' the Singin' Strays! He's doubtless got talent, an' besides, given what kind of giant mass of blubber Ah am now..."

She poked herself in the belly button for emphasis after lifting her gigantic gut up enough so that she could reach it, then dropped her massive paunch back down after releasing it and continued: "...we might need someone who can help out with things like when Ah fall over despite mah still bein' able ta walk, albeit slowly an' only on mah hind legs. Or, if it proves too difficult for me ta keep up with the rest'a y'all when we're goin' from place ta place because o' said slowness, he could enjoy the fun'a rollin' me around. After all, ya did comfort me when Ah needed it the most, Flash, not ta mention that bein' famous would surely be a dream come true for ya, somethin' ya really deserve for bein' such a great guy."

"An', when we're visitin' places that don't have enough beds for all'a us ta sleep in, Ah'm easily fat enough for both you an' Cash ta use as a really warm an' comfy bed." Dixie said, grabbing a hold of both of her giant love handles and then turning around and about slowly as so not to fall over so that everyone could see just how true it was that she was only too clearly that fat. "That'd be wonderful, wouldn't it?"

Looking at Flash, she asked: "So, whaddaya say, Flash? Y'all wanna join the most famous band'a dogs in the South an' enjoy it alongside mah newly regained boyfriend named Cash when ya need some way ta sleep comfortably an' there's so much more'a me ta love, be friends with an' sing together with, among lots else just as wonderful?"

The response was as follows.
151212123.title: Something unexpected happens.

choices: Flash makes his big debut on stage with the Singin' Strays.
The Singin' Strays go on tour.
The Singin' Strays including Flash have a run in with someone.
1512121231.content:
"Little lady I'll accept your offer to join the Singin' Strays for after all I've always dreamed of becoming a big time country music superstar." Flash said as he accepted her band's offer.

"That's great to hear Flash ergo Flash is now part of the Singin' Strays everyone!" Dixie proudly said.

"Welcome aboard Flash for after all your dream of becoming a big time country music superstar is about to come true!" Floyd proudly said as he welcomed Flash with open paws.

"We're most delighted to have you perform with us for after all you'll do great brother." Waylon said as he too welcomed Flash with open paws as well.

"Sonny boy it's an honor to have someone as nice as you be part of the Singin' Strays for after all you comforted Dixie in more ways than one ergo I'm real proud of you sonny boy." Granny Rose said as she proudly congratulated Flash himself.

"Now that Dixie's forgiven me and everything ergo you're now part of the Singin' Strays as I can live with that and whatnot for after all you were there when Dixie needed someone to comfort her." Cash said as he reluctantly welcomed Flash with open paws.

"Thank y'all so much for welcoming me with open paws for after all my dream of finally becoming a big time country music superstar's come true for after all my family will never believe me when I tell them I'm a big time country music superstar." Flash said as he was now part of the Singin' Strays.

Later on.....
1512121231.title: Flash accepts the offer.

1512122.content:
"Dixie, the very fact that ya tried to find an alternative would make Zelda proud." Cash said. "The fact that ya might'a been able ta do the opposite of this if ya hadn't been so starving is a sign that you're stronger than you think, and you have not let Zelda down at all."

"Really?" Dixie asked, her face lighting up.

"Really." Cash said while the others nodded to make it clear that he was speaking for all of them.

Waylon then added: "Yeah, we might haveta find a means ta make it so that your bein' so enormously fat now doesn't get in your way or anyone else's in terms of our performances, but said way can easily be found...Ah'm sure of it."

"We all are." Floyd said. "Make no mistake about that at all."

"Furthermore, you're still a dear friend an' beloved band member, an', in mah case, a wonderful girlfriend, no matter what." Cash told Dixie, walking over and hugging the enormous ball of fat that was his ladylove.

Dixie smiled before Cash licked her belly, causing Dixie to laugh, since she was ticklish everywhere but especially on her belly, and, after this caused Dixie to blush, Cash then added on: "I couldn't care less that you're now gigantically obese. I love you for you."

"Thank you, Cash, an' thank all the rest'a y'all." Dixie said to her fellow band members. "Ah'm so glad that nothin' got destroyed because of how mah sadness an' hunger caused me ta do somethin' that, quite frankly, wasn't me. Especially since, ironically, it still happened all the same, an' Ah doubt Ah'm ever gonna be sleek again, the way Ah got mahself as obese as this."

She pulled Cash back in a huge hug while going onto her back, and as Cash said: "WHOA!" when it happened, gripping her hard as so to not fall off of her, everyone saw that Dixie was only too right, as it was clear that she was easily the fattest dog in all of Tennessee.

Cash helped Dixie after that, the both of them getting her back on her feet with their combined efforts, well, her hind feet, anyway, and after Dixie said: "Thank you, love." and Cash nodded happily, the latter suddenly realized something and said: "Wait. We have ta point out how gigantically corpulent Dixie is to our fans so they don't get the shock of their lives the next time they see us perform. I'll do it."

Would he?
1512122.title: They stayed her friends

15221.content: how does Marie gain, maybe she enjoys her life too much or maybe edgar forces her to gain?
15221.title: Naturally

choices: Edgar begins to get food ready
Marie shackled to stop her moving before edgar leaves
152211.content:
“Finally I got rid of those mangy cats, I don’t know what the mistress is thinking when giving all of her inheritance to them, they wouldn’t even know what to do with it unlike a gentleman such as myself” Edgar stated fixing his bow tie as during his plan to get rid of his mistress beloved cats he had gotten a little disheveled. Believing that he had gotten rid of the four cats that were owned by Madam Adelaide, not even realizing there was an error in his judgement as the cats were more than capable of making it back to the house as it wasn’t hard to venture the countryside where they were left off at, especially when they had a tomcat named Thomas O’Malley to help them get back to where they lived thanks to his unconventional reasoning. The thing that Edgar didn’t even notice was that not all the cats wherein the bag when he drove off to the countryside trying to get rid of all the cats, he thought that it would be a fool proof plan just drop them off somewhere and they wouldn’t bother them ever again, not realizing he miscounted in his initial kidnapping attempt. The only one that was still left in the mansion with Edgar and Madam Adelaide was little Marie who was still exploring the giant mansion that she lived in not even crossing her mind that her brothers and mother were nowhere around for her to play with she was just concentrating on exploring the other areas of the mansion that she could never explore before as her mother believed it to be too dangerous for kittens to explore. “As a lady we must always be quite dignified especially when exploring the home” Marie said to her self being her usual high-class self, looking around she found some stairs that she didn’t know we're here in the mansion she didn’t know what kind of secrets this opened door held it made young Marie want to explore them even more it was exhilarating to her to be on a solo adventure without her unruly brothers to create problems for her.

Wanting to explore the depths of this new area that she had discovered on her travels still blissfully unaware that her mother and brothers were no longer on the property of Madame Adelaide, she was too busy intrigued with this new lower level to really realize that they were going “what is down there I wonder” the young kitten thought to herself she just as she began her descent to where ever this place was she wanted to explore it, something new had always made her excited as the dull and drab was always boring for her she wanted to do something at least a little exciting to do in this mansion. Closer and closer she got to the lower level the steps creaked with every step she took this place seemed to be slightly musty in smell but it was spacious in its size there were many bottles of liquids that lined up on the wall Marie wondered what this place was, when she finally saw a familiar face humming to themselves not paying much attention to their surroundings.

It was Edgar who opened the door as he believed that with him getting rid of the cats that his fortune was secure from Madam Adelaide, so gleefully he picked up a bottle of vintage wine not even noticing the little white kitten inching closer and closer to him until she was near his leg rubbing against it in a happy manner, feeling this on his leg made him jump with fear as he thought it could have been a rat seeing how dusty this place was. “oh no how did you escape?” Edgar wondered as he didn’t know how he missed one of the cats from his plan, this was something that he didn’t know what to do, rushing to the door that leads to the upstairs he locked it so that his Madam wouldn’t see that one of the kittens was still in the mansion, this was something that she didn’t need to know but he knew that he had to do something about this kitten to make it so she couldn’t climb those stairs. Something clicked in Edgar’s mind when he said that, if she was too fat to move she couldn’t even move to climb those stairs, his evil plan was taking shape and he couldn’t be happier, rushing to get all that he would need to make this happen, Marie just looked on in wonder as she just sat there wondering why Edgar was in such a tizzy.
152211.title: Edgar's fears

1531.content: Who From Zootopia will gain?
1531.title: Zootopia

15311.content: How will the spunky Police officer gain?
15311.title: Judy Hopps

153111.content: Maybe the little bunny cop begins to eat against her will or maybe she just gets lazy?
153111.title: Naturally

choices: Through the Hall to a banquet
1531111.content:
Figuring out that it wasn't just a primal instinct that carnivorous animals had, it was just an influenced rage that was brought upon by a flower known as the night howler. Breaking the case of the animals going aggressive was what drove Judy forward. Nick wasn't anywhere near Judy, finding out the truth of what was happening in Zootopia was all that mattered to Judy. All she could do was grab a few samples of the night howler concoction proving to chief Bogo that there was something larger at play, the sheep that were manufacturing the night howler concoction were defiantly not happy with young Judy and her great reasoning skills. Chasing through the abandoned tunnel systems that ran throughout Zootopia, fearing what they would do to her if caught by them. Judy did what all rabbits did well, she ran as fast as she could knowing that what she held in her hand was a very major price to the puzzle that was plaguing her fair city.

　　"Give me that you damn bunny" the muscular sheep yelled at Judy almost trapping her behind a rusted grate that he had flung at her. Outsmarting the bumbling sheep wasn't hard as it seemed these sheep were just brawn with no brains, grinning like a Cheshire Judy knew that if she could just lead these two under the museum of natural history she could meet up with nick and take these two in with little effort. Seeing the maintenance hatch that leads to the museum, Judy knew that her chance to lock these guys up was at hand and she could fully interrogate these bumbling idiots for information that could help crack this case wide open.

　　Finally, she was inside the museum's interior, from small age she loved coming to this museum as a child, she knew this museum like the back of her hand from coming here so many times as a child. Luring the two into the prehistoric, this is where she thought nick would be hanging out, correct in her assumption as his bushy tail could be seen near the human exhibit. Closer and closer she got to her dear friend nick the more she realized something was wrong with him, unmoving from his position Judy began to shout for him "Nick I got the evidence, but I'm gonna need help here with these guys" still Nicks body refused to move. Almost to nick, she pushed herself to see what was wrong with her friend, from the shadows stepping over the lifeless body of Nick the creature came into the light. Holding a shovel in their hands the creature was revealed to be assistant mayor bellwether, knowing she couldn't cover her crime she let her true colors show through. With malice intent bellwether stated with a chuckle as she dropped the shovel "I guess he won't be bothering us for some time", shocked at what the little lamb was capable of made Judy back away from bellwether slowly not wanting the assistant mayor to do anything rash.

" I really liked you Judy and all the gusto you have, but all that has to end for big things are changing in Zootopia, things that I can't allow to be mucked up by you miss Hopps” Bellwether said so coyly, not even noticing the two large sheep creeping up upon the small bunny, not even noticing that the burly sheep brothers were sneaking up on her, suddenly she was caught. Judy, try as she might to escape the clutches of the two henchmen that bellwether had hired for her plans. “my dear Judy I’m sorry but I can’t allow you to leave, no, no I have plans for you my dear” chuckled Bellwether as she motioned her henchmen to follow her. Knowing that what the assistant mayor had nothing good planned for her, she knew that she had to escape from the clutches of Bellwether.
1531111.title: Cracking the Case

1533112.content: how will cub nala gain?
1533112.title: Cub Nala

15331121.content: how does the cub gain, does she get force fed or does she do it to herself
15331121.title: Naturally

153311211.content:
Nala was at the local watering hole with Simba, as Simba played with a butterfly probably terrorizing the poor thing, Nala was lying down next to the watering hole sleeping.as something seemed to be in the bushes that was just a far ways off from the place that they played so quietly, as Nala and Simba went on with their usual day.Zazu carefully watching the two cubs from afar like the proper babysitter his highness had ask him to play. It was actually a nice to see the peace in the pride rocks it was charming at least there wasn’t any danger, balance and unity flourished across the land, even different types of animals got some what along without much hostility. This was a great site to be seen for its king, Mufasa was happy with his loving family and how the pride lands ran. Meanwhile Simba and Nala just hung out around the watering hole playing, this was a local watering hole many animals frequented this hole so it was always fun to play with other animals that were there, even though some of the animals that frequented it were afraid of Nala and Simba just because of them being lions.this was something that just made Nala upset for she wanted nothing more than new friends but she didn't know how to make some. Simba was a fun friend and she had lots of good times with him but she didn’t want just one friend. While this was stirring inside her brain as she looked into the deep blue water inside the watering whole she didn’t realize all the animal began to scurry away for right behind her was a lone figure was posed behind bushes, not really paying any attention to the fleeing animals. His concentration was on the cub,as he had put a tranquilizer dart in the rifle, pulled it up, sighting his target and shot the dart into the cub's hindquarters. The subject target would be sedated for extraction and transport.He noticed the other lion cub that was playing with her also turned tail and fled from the scene. Less of a bother. He'd have to hurry before any adult lions arrived. He got up and went over to the lion cub subject, wondering for the tenth time why the Madame would want such a useless looking animal in the first place. Perhaps for her own petting zoo, he guessed.

Setting down the pet holding container, he scooped up the lion cub and set her into it, closing the small door on it and
latching the door closed. Carrying his precious cargo, he puts the pet carrier in the back of his vehicle, starts up the engine and drives off, heading back to deliver the cargo of the lion cub subject to his employer. But as he drove away, there was a lioness that had arrived on the scene. The mother of the lioness cub, Sarafina. So what does a caring mother do? Immediately takes off
and follows the vehicle, but at a safe held back distance. Also as to not get herself tired and exhausted. But even if she
would get captured, then at least she hopes she'd be with her daughter Nala. She hopes to get to where the human was
taking Nala by night then get Nala away from the humans and back to the pride.

When the man arrived to the estate of his employer, he stopped the vehicle then turned it off, then went to the back to get
the pet carrier out and place it on the ground in a shady spot before opening the carrier to let out the lion cub subject. He was
sure that this would be the last time he'd see the lion cub. Done with that, he went to go tell the Madame about her prized
lion cub's arrival and also collect his job payment then got into his vehicle to drive off again, heading back to wherever his own home was here in Africa.Sarafina chased after the car as fast as she could not realizing that she was moving farther and father away from pride rock, she didn't care about this right now her cub was in trouble and she was going to do all she could to get her back. Making sure not to be spotted by the humans that were around the area, she stayed low and inside the tall grass hoping that no one would find her as she came up with a plan of some sort to get her daughter back and be home as soon as possible.

As Sarafina looked around she noticed something quite odd about the surrounding area, the plains were lush, trees that she had never seen before were present in this place, this place was nothing she had seen before it was a strange place nonetheless. This giant hut was something that she never seen before, it was huge and white there were men patrolling the area, she didn't know how to get into this place or even where her daughter would be in this giant place. About to make her move she felt a sharp pain in her side like something was in her, feeling woozy she tried to fight it but what ever she was shot with finally won the battle. As Sarafina slept she felt the calming sound of her daughter's voice, waking up in a strange place that was a different jungle entirely, she hugged he daughter and licked her lovingly. A door swung open and two humans walked in, they both seemed quite refined as they gleefully looked at Nala with an evil twinkle in their eyes, these humans seemed to be the mistresses of the house, Sarafina protected Nala with a fearsome roar. A man came behind Sarafina to restrain her as the mistresses picked Nala looking at Sarafina the black haired woman said to the chained mother "Don't worry my dear she is safe here your cub is our pet project"

Sarafina begun to tug upon the chain that confined her that was held by a burly looking man, he was easily holding back Sarafina from g getting towards her only daughter it was a quite surprising feat she knew that these two ladies were up to no good she didn’t know what t was going to happen to them but she knew that the two of them h ad to get back to the pride lands it was their home and they will get back to it no matter what it would take it was just a matter of time before they did. This man would make it difficult to leave, but it seemed it was an open area with nothing but a fence to confine the two lionesses in this area a waterfall seemed to in the background near a large den area which all seemed to be man made are a, even the grass lands seemed to be man made with the intent to keep the two in this very area, for what reason was unknown to Sarafina but she would protect her daughter as much as she can. Noticing the two women who seemed to be fawning over the little cub the two petted her lovingly as if they were going to take care of the little one with all the power they had, yet there was something quite sinister about the women that Sarafina couldn’t put her her paw on, it was like the same feelings she got when ever scar was upon her her presence. “My, my aren’t you just the cutest little cub eve r” the woman with the black hair stated while she petted the frightened Nala almost curled up in a ball the young girl didn’t know what to make of these women but she didn’t want to trust these humans fully, it felt good to be petted by the black haired woman, Na la didn’t even notice the Brunette woman grabbing a couple of thing s from the house that was just at the edge of the fenced in area. Purring Nala didn't even realize that one of the women was gone she was enthralled with being petted and pampered, " my, my aren't you a small little cub, such a thin little girl, don't worry we will fix that" a devilish grin appeared upon the black lady old face.

Meanwhile inside the house the brunette woman was searching the mansion for the materials needed to measure and weigh the tiny cub, such a series of strange events had conspired instead of just getting a cub they also got the mother of the young cub, this wasn't apart of the plan but they hope the mother wouldn't be too much of a problem as the begun to use her daughter as another project. As she grabbed a scale from the bathroom the old lady begun to pass various pictures of other animals that had undergone their pet project. All of the animals had two things in common with each other, they were all female and massively overweight. Finding the measuring tape she begun her journey to the outside grasslands to return to the side of the other woman " sister Giselle, I have retrieved the materials needed to start of the little cub's journey" Nala wasn't even paying attention to the other one she was just loving the feeling of being petted. Grabbing the scale from her sister Giselle begun to weigh Nala without the knowledge she was even being weighed by one of the master's of the house.

Harder and harder was it to control Sarafina as the large man started to lose his grip on the chain that controlled the large lioness mere inches from Nala, Sarafina was doing everything she could to protect Nala and cuddle with her daughter. Regaining control of the chain around the neck of Sarafina, she had to watch as the one called Giselle pinched and prodded her daughter, looking dissatisfied when she didn't find any flub upon Nala's body.

Leading Nala upon the scale to weigh the young cub, the scale lightly creaked when it was used by Nala, a measly twenty pounds was upon Nala's body, disgruntled about this Giselle wanted to fatten up Nala as quickly as she could, but she wanted to remember this special occasion, as she did with all the other animals. "Dear sister Lindsay would you please take a picture of our new pet" Giselle said to her younger sister as she cuddled the young cub, grinning the two could only imagine the feast young Nala was about to endure...
153311211.title: In the morning

153312.content: How about the princess of the prideland? Adult or Cub?
153312.title: Kiara

15331211.content: how will she gain, does some one force feed her or does she gain on her own?
15331211.title: Natually

1533122.content: how does Kiara gain while she is a cub?
1533122.title: Cub Kiara

15331221.content: Does she gain on her own or does some one force feed her?
15331221.title: Naturally

153312211.content:
he Savannah had been hit hard by the reign of scar, never really understood the circle of life philosophy that his predecessors all stood by as he didn’t see the point to the constant balance that came with the circle of life, Scar was more interested in getting his fill of zebra and repaying the debt he owed to the hyenas as they are the ones that helped him take over. this was quite some time ago since the time of Scar’s militaristic reign, yet some of his rules could still be felt throughout the area as some of the pride lands still wasn’t back to a time when Mufasa was actually the king of the pride lands, actually caring for the people who he protected in this area of the savannah, it was unlike how his brother ruled as Scar never sought to do right by the people he protected instead he wanted to use his power to get whatever he whim it to appear in front of him. Thanks to the return of the actual king, Simba the suffering that was taking place thanks to Scar. Since that time things were finally beginning to change for the better, having the proper leader in pride rock was one of the key points that made the pride lands flourish in the first place, it has been many years since the battle Simba had with his uncle for Nala and Simba had two children by the time the pride lands begun its return to former glory, yet there were lions who still stuck by the decisions that were made by the previous leader of the pride lands, these lions would now be exiled out of the pride lands and called the outlanders.

It was a new day on a new generation Simba’s daughter was as curious as her father was at her age wanting to explore the Pride lands in its entirety, but with an overprotective father like Simba on her tail about every little thing that she did, this was almost impossible to do as even when alone she had two very clumsy caretakers watching her from the shadows, even if those shadows were in places that had lots of grubs to dine on. “Hey, Pumbaa, there are some juicy Beetles over there shouldn’t we keep an eye on them?” Timon said to the large warthog whom he was good friends with, some might say that he and this warthog were inseparable as they were always seen grazing the pride lands in search of bugs together.

“Uhh, Timon I didn’t want to interrupt you but aren’t we supposed to be taking care of Kiara and not munching on these beetles?”

Not even noticing Kiara and what she was doing as both of her caretakers were more focused with lighthearted bickering than keeping an eye on her, “this is my chance to catch up to Tiifu and Zuri and see what is going on at the watering hole” Whispering to her self-making sure neither Pumbaa or Timon heard her thoughts or her slinking away from them to join her friends at the watering hole. Pumbaa asked his friend meekly as the other was too enamored with collecting beetles before they flew away to even give his friend prober response only stating to Pumbaa, “Relax Pumbaa she is safe we don’t need to keep an eye on her in the pride lands” how very wrong he was not even he could realize that something was going to happen that would make these few moments with her protectors the happiest she had been.
153312211.title: A new day

choices: They bring her to thier den to Vitani
they go to a watering hole first
follow the messanger who is reporting to simba
1533122111.content:
Kiara didn’t know how she could have managed it but she had been lost, running from Timon and Pumbaa had caused her to lose her way in the thick brush that Kiara thought she could use it to hide from the grub eaters. Though it did work to give her overprotective uncles the slip so she could meet her friends at the watering hole Kiara had lost her way and didn’t exactly know where she was, the area where Timon and Pumbaa led Kiara was a trail that she didn’t travel all that much as she never really was away from Pride rock that often. Looking for something that she would recognize maybe something like Bunga’s tree that he and her uncles usually live near, or maybe Rafiki’s home something that would let her know where she was. Nothing jumped out at her that she was going the right way or if she was getting further and further away from her home, coming to an opening from where the brush had ended made it easier at least a little bit for Kiara to figure out where she was going and maybe she would see some other animals that could help her figure out where the cub had ended up. Cautiously Kiara moved through the open area hoping that there weren’t any kind of predators around that would see her as a snack of sorts, there was still hope that she would find someone who could help her is the what she was banking on.

“Where am I anyway, daddy is going to be mad at me if I don’t return home quickly and I don’t want Timon and Pumbaa to get yelled at too for my mistake”

Kiara thought to herself, brushing off some dirt off of her coat before continuing her travels through the Pridelands making sure that she looked around for someone who could help her in some shape or form. Coming up empty for finding people who knew the area better than Kiara did was quite disappointing, the earth beneath her feet seemed to become more and more cracked and dry, dust continually was pushed up by the winds. Kiara didn’t know that there were areas of the pride lands that looked to be so inhospitable. Deeper into the canyon Kiara looked around hoping to see at least something that of a landmark or something that she could use to figure out where she was, but nothing really stood out to her it all just blended together in a beige blur.

The muttering of voices was coming ahead of Kiara, relief came to mind when Kiara heard these voices hoping whoever it was could help her get back home and away from this desolate area. Being a bit precautions due to her nature Kiara crept up to where those sounds were coming from hoping to see who was making them think it must be a lizard or some kind of desert-dwelling animal, she didn’t know what it was so Kiara thought it would be best to take it slowly hoping it wasn’t a hyena or any of the other vicious clans of animals that made area’s like this their home. Hiding behind a large pile of rocks Kiara poked her head above her hiding spot to see that the animals that were making noise were a bunch of Lionesses, not knowing them or if they even were from the Pridelands Kiara was immediately wary of them and their presence. looking as if two were having some sort of disagreement in where they were going Kiara thought it would be best if she could listen to their conversation, placing one ear close to the ground she began listening in to their conversation as

“I’m tired of just eating I bugs and other small animals, why don’t we just go into the Pridelands Zira? We could just attack them and be done with them instead of just scrounging around for an ibex or two.” the small lioness grumbled to herself not wanting what seemed to be the leader of the group to hear her complaints about their current situation, being Outlanders didn’t help as much as it did hurt them.

“Because my dear sweet Abena, if we attacked the Pridelands which has more lions and lionesses that we Outlanders do than we would be wiped out, don’t worry your pretty little head, I know thinking isn’t your strong suit” Zira smug in her statement looked proud in the fact that she put the young lioness in her place.

Seeing the danger that she was in Kiara thought it would be best to leave the area post-haste before she was found out by the group of lionesses, not looking at what was behind her Kiara accidentally stepped on a dry twig causing an echoing snapping sound to reverberate through the surrounding area. Zira not wanting to be ambushed by anything leaped toward the sound ready to fight whatever it was that was trying to sneak up on the group. A surprise was the first thing that came to mind when Zira found that the one who was trying to sneak around wasn’t an enemy of sorts it was just the royal brat that Simba had birthed. Zira wasn’t pleased to see someone from the Pridelands sneaking up on her group, snarling at Kiara Zira had just thought of how to keep her people well fed.

“looks like our little meal ticket had just fallen into our laps, as well as keep Vitani busy with her new fascination” The older lioness chuckled before grabbing Kiara by the nape

“Please my father would be very disappointed with me if I don’t return home, Zira please let me go” Kiara begged, tears welling up from her eyes knowing how much trouble she was going to be in if she didn’t return soon, these pleas fell on deaf ears none of the lionesses felt guilty thinking how much meat they would get from keeping Kiara hostage.

“You shouldn’t have come to her little princess, if you would have stayed in the Pridelands then none of this would have happened but don’t worry Vitani will keep you company for a while” one of the lioness states in a matter of factually way laughing at what they were doing none were too concerned with the repercussion as the went deeper into the outlands to ……
1533122111.title: The abandoned

15332.content: how about the toy maker's daughter or maybe Felic the pet fat cat of Ratigan?
15332.title: The great mouse detective

153321.content: why does miss Flaversham gain?
153321.title: Olivia

1533211.content: How does she gain does she do it to her self or is she force fed?
1533211.title: Naturally

15332111.content:
Olivia was captured by the vile, yet cunning Ratigan, just for a moment she had escaped the line of sight of the world-famous detective Basil and his new friend Dawson, they had searched high and low for the young Flaversham, the peg-legged bat that had once capture Olivia’s father, being able to see her father the old toymaker again was one thing that made her day. Knowing that they were both the trapped by the criminal genius Ratigan only made them fear about what was going to happen to them, “father I missed you so much I didn’t know what was to become of you” Olivia stated as tears of joy ran down her face she didn’t know how to express how glad she was that her father was alive and well. Just as their touching reunion began it ended abruptly as Olivia not even noticing the evil Ratigan tore her away from her loving father without a second thought. “Ratigan you vile devil, give me back my daughter right now, I’ll do what you’ll say just give me my daughter” Begged Hiram upon deaf ears as his daughter was gone once more thanks to none other than their peg-legged friend a one mister Fidget, with his Cheshire like grin and a nod to his boss He scooped the girl up and took her to another part of the Place Ratigan called home. “Now you see her Mr. Flaversham if that contraption doesn’t work properly then you will never see your dear daughter again for she will be lunch for my dear Felicia” as he raised he bell he used many times to call upon his pet to get rid of his enemies. Fearing for his daughter’s welfare he made it apparent to the cynical Ratigan that he was going to comply with his demands if it meant the return of his daughter unscathed. “It will be done on time, just don’t hurt my daughter she is all I have left” Hiram begged with the maniacal Ratigan, a devilish grin appeared upon the evil rats face, knowing that he has won the old toymaker over with the danger of his daughter. Assuring Hiram that nothing will harm Olivia Ratigan state in a coy way “Do not despair my dear Hiram your only child will be taken care of and WELL FED”
　　
　　Olivia was taken to a very lavished room far away from her father, fidget didn’t know what to do with the young mouse so all he could do until his boss arrived was make sure the little girl didn’t escape her confides. “Boss will be with you shortly my pretty deary” chuckled Fidget the young mouse looked tasty to the large bat, almost good enough to eat, as she backed slowly into a corner with the advances of Fidget to just devour the poor girl in one solemn gulp. The door whipped open as the mastermind who took her and her father to whatever this place was, the man looked at the girl with a crazed yet dignified expression, somehow she knew that whenever this man entered the room, no matter how sincere and refined he seemed to be, it meant no good. “My dear Olivia Please make yourself at home it seems as if we will have lots of quality time together as your father still has time to work on that little do-hickey that will grant him your and his freedom” the sly rat said, as he poured Olivia a spot of tea to soothe her nerves and nodding to one of his lackeys to retrieve the dessert cart for the young mistress. Sipping with the tea he had just poured into his cup and munching upon a scone that laid on the cart he sensed the distrust that emitted from Olivia in her way. Comforting children was not his forte he didn’t even like them, but try Ratigan did as he was still a man of social graces, no matter how criminal his activities were. Getting close enough to the girl Ratigan tried to comfort her, “there my dear it will not be long until my uses for your father have ended so bear with this until then” trying to reason with the girl seemed futile as her response to his reasoning was hot burning tea in the face. Angered by the acts that Olivia had taken, Ratigan grabbed a handful of sweets from the cart and shoved it in the young girl’s mouth, only action she could take was to swallow the food that was shoved into her face, evilly Ratigan begun to ponder the proper Punishment for the young girl whom has just disregarded his hospitality with searing tea to his face, “Fidget Make sure Miss Flaversham eats every last crumb that laid upon this cart, I want to see her lick it clean, I told her father she would be well fed in my care” Ratigan stated with a wide grin upon his face if she wasn’t going to be a good prisoner he will make her beg for him to stop. He left her in the good care of fidget, he had some other things to take care of and one girl in a locked room shouldn’t be too hard to feed for one bat, Fidget eyed all the delicious sweets on the table and he wondered what to feed her first.
15332111.title: Ratigan's Rage

153332131.content: how does foxglove the bat gain weight?
153332131.title: Foxglove

1533321311.content: Does she gain on her own accord or does she gain cause she is forced to?
1533321311.title: Naturally

choices: Foxglove thinks about how to escape
15333213111.content:
Foxglove has been unemployed from the horrendous washer woman Winfred for some time now, with her new found freedom she just didn’t know what to do with her self. Not wanting to bother the rescue rangers with her minuscule woes, Foxglove avoided them like the plague. She got odd jobs that help out the community that resided in and around central park, becoming somewhat of a mail carrier Foxglove had to adhering to the new rules and regulation that came with the job that she has chosen for herself, life was good from where she stood, not working for the dreadful Winfred was such a step up in the eyes of the cute little pink bat that she didn’t know if she could ever go back to being nothing more that a servant for the washer woman. If it wasn’t for the rescue rangers she still might be working for Winfred as her familiar, stealing items for her to become a full fledged witch and doing other dastardly things to please her master, it seemed like a far off memory to Foxglove, she was glad to be a parcel deliverer than anything else, Foxglove was happy at last. Her boss was a elderly shrew whom worked hand and hand with the human’s delivery services without the humans even realizing that they were there to interfere with the parcels that were exchanged, it was a coexistence that one party wasn't[t even aware about was even happening which is how that old shrew liked it. Many Parcels were delivered all over New York some were far and some where just in the next tree, this is why Foxglove loved her job, she never got to visit so many different people at a time, she was surprisingly good at her job too which didn’t hurt.
　　
　　Late again she made her breakfast, to go as Foxglove begun to race to the office as her previous encounters with old lady shrew have taught her anything about her job is not to be late to it, daytime she was late to pick up her daily mail to be delivered to all the animals around central park and beyond, shrew always gave her an earful about how it was their duty to be on time the slightest miscalculation could be a disastrous event for the whole entire community. Not even saying hello to the old shrew Foxglove begun her duties to deliver the mail to all the awaiting people in the area, a with her favorite satchel and a chipper altitude she begun her rounds, around central park Fox glove had met all of her familiar faces, Mr. and Mrs. Squirrel, grouchy Mr. Beaver, and the large family of Mice all have very heavy and important packages that Foxglove delivered without a hitch. As she looked upon her list of places to deliver, she noticed a package was to be delivered near where she used to live where Wilfred lived, not wanting to go near that area she thought to just skip it, thinking it over in her mind her good nature personality took over and despite her fears she went to deliver that mail.
　　
　　Nothing has changed in her old neighborhood, even though its been a while since Foxglove has been near this area, she flew it like she never left. Finding a one Mr. Bartholomew Rat’s house wasn’t hard at all, Delivering the package with a kind heart and grin to match, Foxglove felt good about conquering her fears of running into her old boss she begun to blindly fly into a net of some sort. Tangled in the net, Foxglove plummeted to the ground in a free fall. Surely she would injure something when she was caught by some one whom stayed hidden among the shadows, “thank you kind person you don’t know how glad I am that I didn’t hit the hard ground” Fox glove stated in her always chipper altitude. Gazing upon the person that saved her all of the pink from her fur vanished as the person whom saved her was none other than Wilfred, maniacally the woman laughed while stating triumphantly “My dear think nothing of it, we have so much to discuss my little experiment” whisked away, Foxglove could only cry as she didn’t know her fate.
15333213111.title: Foxglove the mail bat

info.brief_description: the girls of different species related cartoon shows or movie start to pack on the pounds
info.description:
This is a weight gain about our favorite animal cartoon character.

*No sex
*Females only
*No vore
*No scat
*No heavy Slob, light food smears are okay.
*Keep it clean and fun
* Minimum story length of 1000 words or more
*Try and keep the storyline going.
*Have fun with it.
